title: Dialogflow - Other samples and learning material
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Other samples and learning material
The [quickstarts](/dialogflow/docs/quick) and [how-to guides](/dialogflow/docs/how) provide basic, detailed tutorials and samples. This page lists other high quality samples and courses found on other sites.
content:
## Google Cloud Skills Boost
The following courses are available in [Google Cloud Skills Boost](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/) , and you can earn Google Cloud badges:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/160?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=18484514) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Citizen Devs](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/310?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=20226758) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Software Devs](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/306?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A5%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=18484516) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/165?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=18484509) 
- [Automate Interactions with Contact Center AI](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/quests/127?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=19752889) 
- [Implementing an AI Chatbot with Dialogflow ES](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/focuses/634?parent=catalog) ## Coursera
Coursera offers the following courses:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://www.coursera.org/learn/contact-center-ai-conversational-design-fundamentals) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Citizen Devs](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=RAoUX_vcEeucKgqtjqzixw&productType=course&query=virtual+agent&showMiniModal=true&source=search) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Software Devs](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=1aGDrQv_Eeu_jQ68JgKaWQ&productType=course&query=virtual+agent&showMiniModal=true&source=search) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=GQYD9AwAEeuLRAqUiS7ZKQ&productType=course&query=contact+center+AI&showMiniModal=true&source=search) 
- [Contact Center AI: Building a Dynamic Virtual Agent](https://www.coursera.org/learn/contact-center-ai-building-a-dynamic-virtual-agent) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://www.coursera.org/learn/contact-center-ai-operations-and-implementation) ## Pluralsight
Pluralsight offers the following courses:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/ccai-conversational-design-fundamentals) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Citizen Devs](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/virtual-agent-development-dialogflow-es-citizen-devs) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow ES for Software Devs](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/ccai-virtual-agent-development-dialogflow-es-software-developers) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/ccai-operations-implementation) ## Google GitHub
You can browse additional samples from Google at GitHub with the links below.
| Language | Links         |
|:-----------|:-----------------------------------------|
| C#   | GoogleCloudPlatform/dotnet-docs-samples/ |
| Go   | GoogleCloudPlatform/golang-samples  |
| Java  | GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples |
| Node.js | googleapis/nodejs-dialogflow    |
| PHP  | GoogleCloudPlatform/php-docs-samples  |
| Python  | GoogleCloudPlatform/python-docs-samples |
| Ruby  | googleapis/google-cloud-ruby    |
## Cloud Architecture Center
The Cloud Architecture Center provides tutorials on using many Google Cloud products together. You can [search for tutorials that use Dialogflow](/architecture#/?q=dialogflow) .
## Streaming
Code samples & tutorials:
- [A best practice for streaming audio from a browser microphone to Dialogflow by using websockets: Code sample, building an IoT Selfservice Kiosk](https://github.com/dialogflow/selfservicekiosk-audio-streaming/) 
- [Introduction to the Google Cloud conversational AI components, and integrating your own voice AI in a web app.](https://medium.com/@ladysign/building-your-own-conversational-voice-ai-with-dialogflow-speech-to-text-in-web-apps-part-i-b92770bd8b47) 
- [Building a client-side web application which streams audio from a browser microphone to a server.](https://medium.com/@ladysign/building-a-client-side-web-app-which-streams-audio-from-a-browser-microphone-to-a-server-part-ii-df20ddb47d4e) 
- [Building a web server which receives a browser microphone stream and uses Dialogflow or the Speech to Text API for retrieving text results.](https://medium.com/google-cloud/building-a-web-server-which-receives-a-browser-microphone-stream-and-uses-dialogflow-or-the-speech-62b47499fc71) 
- [Getting Audio Data from Text (Text to Speech) and play it in your browser.](https://medium.com/@ladysign/getting-audio-data-from-text-text-to-speech-and-play-it-in-your-browser-part-iv-cd2d6ea71c6a) 
- [Web streaming samples](https://github.com/dialogflow/selfservicekiosk-audio-streaming) ## Community
Blogs and tutorials written by the community:
- [A simple solution for fetching data from a headless CMS in a Dialogflow Chatbot](https://medium.com/google-cloud/a-simple-solution-for-fetching-data-from-a-headless-cms-in-a-dialogflow-chatbot-6edfa7c5e4c7) 
- [Building your own conversational voice AI with Dialogflow & Speech To Text in web apps](https://medium.com/google-cloud/building-your-own-conversational-voice-ai-with-dialogflow-speech-to-text-in-web-apps-part-i-b92770bd8b47) 
- [Create high-quality chatbots by making use of agent validation, an out of the box review feature.](https://medium.com/google-cloud/create-high-quality-chatbots-by-making-use-of-agent-validation-an-out-of-the-box-review-feature-85b47fdebd) 
- [Mastering auto speech adaptation in Dialogflow for voice agents](https://medium.com/google-cloud/mastering-auto-speech-adaptation-in-dialogflow-for-voice-agents-25d5b65a1cf9) 
- [Orchestrate multiple sub chatbots from one chat interface](https://medium.com/google-cloud/orchestrate-multiple-sub-chatbots-from-one-chat-interface-8cf3554ce3f5)
